utACK fa0e1e2

Only nit could be to drop:
```
Files: debian/*
Copyright: 2010-2011, Jonas Smedegaard <dr@jones.dk>
           2011, Matt Corallo <matt@bluematt.me>
License: GPL-2+
```

from [contrib/debian/copyright](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/debian/copyright), as `copyright` is now the only file in `debian/*`.

Edit: @MarcoFalke What do you mea

Currently people tend to be pretty good about updating contrib/debian/copyright when things change, which is super nice cause I won't ever keep track of it. It may make sense to move it from contrib/debian/copyright to contrib/copyright or something like that.
It is still in the debian format, so I think it makes sense to keep in the debian folder. (Also I don't feel like updating all the internal and external links to the file)
If anyone feels strongly about that, it should be done in a separate commit to not invalidate the previous review.
